name: stutteringly
content:
stutteringly adverb
(SPEAKING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who speaks or says something, especially the first part of a word, with difficulty, for example pausing or repeating a sound several times: Do you think you ever said anything stutteringly?
More examplesFewer examplesHe stutteringly finished his sentence.I asked the parent if she wanted to change schools, and she stutteringly said that she did not.I stutteringly asked him if he'd like to come with me.
